Articles.Content:
I'm getting a bunch of errors (like, enough spam to lag my game) on my modded install. According to the log, this is the error:

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object

EnhancedNavBall.CalculationStore.RunCalculations (.Vessel vessel, Quaternion gymbal)

EnhancedNavBall.EnhancedNavBall.LateUpdate ()

Anyone know what this is and/or how to fix it?

I have about a million mods installed, which I recognize means I'm pretty much on my own, so I'm mostly curious if anyone has seen this before and resolved it?

EDIT:

I uninstalled EnhancedNavBall. The error continued, but this time referencing Raster Prop Monitor. My theory is that the mods are attempting to call conics data that career mode currently doesn't allow (since I have not yet upgraded the tracking station to allow patched conics, and my pilots are still level 0).

Edited January 8, 2015 by JDCollie

We'll probably need to hear for sure, but from the 10-ish words I've read about quaternions and orbital mechanics, they aren't very relevant for patched conics. Therefore it's probably not a patched conics issue, though it's probably Tracking-station-related somehow.

We'll probably need to hear for sure, but from the 10-ish words I've read about quaternions and orbital mechanics, they aren't very relevant for patched conics. Therefore it's probably not a patched conics issue, though it's probably Tracking-station-related somehow.

Hmm, okay. I'll post a modlist and log when I get home

Hmm, okay. I'll post a modlist and log when I get home

Actually, can I get a full version of the log? I can probably tell you what's doing it (at least by file name, so it may be up to you to connect that to a mod) but I need the full error, which I don't believe you posted above.
